author: Lauren Valenti
title: Best Beauty Grammys 2017 - Grammys Red Carpet Beauty 2017
text:
The Best Beauty Looks from the 2017 Grammys 
From sky-high hair to bold glitter eyes . Getty By Lauren Valenti Feb 12, 2017 
Of all the red carpets during awards season, the Grammys is our favorite. It's the most fun and it showsâ€”particularly in the beauty department. From sky-high hair to bold glitter eyes, here are the most striking hair and makeup looks from music's big night. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 
The singer rocks a white platinum cropped 'do and extra-long lush lashes. Getty 
Adele debuts bright balayage while rocking her signature inky cat eyes and soft pink lips. Getty
